feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 1:51 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of snow near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
